nodes.text: A voritor lizard was an aggressive, poisonous reptilian creature commonly found on Dantooine and Dathomir. The average voritor was two meters long, with a fan-like dorsal spike. When one decided to attack, it charged its target with incredible speed.
The type native to Dathomir had pointed scales protecting its eyes and ears.

Voritor lizards appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
